attributes.action: Allow the tax payers to decide where our tax money should go
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recent light of the tax claims from the MP's who are in effect the citizens servants, the undersigned demand the right to decide where our tax money goes.

As tax payers, we have no say in how much of our hard earned money goes out in tax and many of us do not agree with how it is spent. This way the citizen decides where the money goes and is invested in an activity which we agree with, for example education.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
